description:
Must be forklift certified*

Responsibilities:

  • Unloading vehicles
  • Accepting deliveries
  • Unpacking containers
  • Verify items
    • inspect conditions
    • compare and count to purchase orders and packing lists
    • document items received
  • Transfer or deliver orders to necessary departments
  • Prepare shipments
    • assembling
    • packing
    • protecting
    • labeling
  • Production and quality control improvements
Key Performance Deliverables:

  • Cross train in Material Control
  • Aid in department improvement
  • Contribute to team efforts

Requirements:

  • H.S. Diploma or GED preferred but not required
  • 1-3 years of warehouse experience

Competencies:

  • Customer Focus
  • Interpersonal Skills
  • Planning and Organization
  • Teamwork
  • Priority and Time Management

1st Shift (7:00 am-3:30 pm)

Multiple Roles

$17 Hourly

Apply now for immediate consideration!!
responsibilities: Unloading vehicles, Accepting deliveries, Unpacking containers, Verify items, inspect conditions, compare and count to purchase orders and packing lists, document items received, Transfer or deliver orders to necessary departments, Prepare shipments, assembling, packing, protecting, labeling, Production and quality control improvements, Cross train in Material Control, Aid in department improvement, Contribute to team efforts

qualifications.preferred: H.S. Diploma or GED, 1-3 years of warehouse experience
